thread.section_title: www.printzone.com.au Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of www.printzone.com.au | www.printzone.com.au
thread.title: Corinne M

author: Corinne M
title: Corinne M
text:
This company is the perfect example of how a business should operate.
Exceptional customer service, excellent prices, and exceptional despatch practices.
They will be the first port of call for anything I can purchase from them in the future.
I placed the order for a Samsung SL-M3870FW Multifunction Printer @ 4.59pm on a Wed, and received a call at 5.05pm to confirm the purchase and check if there would be someone available to accept the delivery next day.
An email with tracking details of my order was received at 5.41pm and the the printer was loaded up before 8am next day and delivered at 1.33pm same day. Less than 24 hours turnaround - I'm impressed especially since I live in regional Victoria.
My newly purchased MFC is going well and has, so far, done everything I have asked it to do. And super quick!
Thank you Printzone.
Cheers
Corinne
